English: A car drove over a pedestrian.
Passenger car got into a crash.
Passenger car collided with a bear.
The van collided with a cyclist.
The car collided with the tree at high speed.
A motorcyclist drifted off the road.
The car drifted into the incoming lane.
The car ended up on its side in the ditch.
Hungarian: Autó az oldalára borult az árokban.

English: The truck was derailed in a ditch.
The car derailed from the road.
The car rolled on its roof at the bottom of the ditch.
Hungarian: Autó a tetejére fordult az árok alján.

English: She crashed into a parked car.
Two passenger cars got into a head-on collision.
The bus drove into the side of a passenger car.
The moped collided with the right side of the taxi.
Hungarian: Robogós a taxi jobb oldalának ütközött.

English: Three cars crashed on the highway.
The chain accident of 7 cars happened at 8 o'clock.
The collision occurred at the highway ramp.

Finnish: Hän lensi auton katon yli useita metrejä.
English: He flew several meters over the roof of the car.
Hungarian: Több métert repült az autó tetején.

English: A motorcyclist drove into the back of a passenger car.
On the road happened a crash that led to a death.
The car driver drove away from the police.
Luckily the car's air bag was triggered.
The driver guilty of the crash left the scene.
Hungarian: A balesetet okozó sofőr elhagyta a helyszínt.

English: The person who collided from the rear didn't stop at the scene.
Hungarian: A hátsó ütközés okozója nem állt meg a helyszínen.

English: The causer of the accident disappeared from the scene.
Hungarian: A baleset okozója eltűnt a helyszínről.

English: The car that caused the crash drove on.
The car drove on without stopping.
The driver fell asleep at the wheel.
It may be caused by the driver falling ill.
Hungarian: Lehet, hogy a sofőr rosszulléte okozta.

English: The men are suspected of drunk driving.

Finnish: Onnettomuuden tarkkaa syytä ei ole tiedossa.
English: The exact cause of the accident is still unknown.
Hungarian: A baleset pontos oka még ismeretlen.

English: One of the cars came from a non-priority road.
Hungarian: Az egyik autó elsőbbség nélküli útról jött.

English: The vehicle drove into the ditch in the bad weather.
Hungarian: A jármű árokba hajtott rossz időben.

English: A person driving the wrong direction caused the crash.
Hungarian: A rossz irányban közlekedő okozta a balesetet.

English: The driver drove through red lights.
Hungarian: A sofőr áthajtott a piros lámpán.

English: The truck drove into the ditch due to slipperiness.
Hungarian: A teherautó a csúszós út miatt hajtott árokba.

English: The police are investigating the cause of the accident.
Hungarian: A rendőrség vizsgálja a baleset okát.

English: Nobody was hurt in the collision.
The driver wasn't injured in the accident.
Hungarian: A sofőr nem sérült a balesetben.

English: The car crash didn't cause any personal injuries.
Hungarian: A baleset személyi sérülést nem okozott.

English: The injuries of the passenger were superficial.
The passenger didn't suffer bigger injuries.
They were transported to receive treatment.
They were taken to the hospital for a check-up.
He was taken to the hospital with an ambulance.
In the head-on collision two men were injured.
Hungarian: Frontális ütközésnél két férfi sérült meg.

English: The woman is still in the hospital.
Hungarian: A nő még mindig kórházi kezelés alatt áll.

English: The driver died in the crash.
Two died in the traffic accident.
One died in a serious crash.
Hungarian: Egy ember meghalt egy súlyos balesetben.

English: He died when driving off the road.
The cyclist died in the crash.
The cyclist died after bumping into the back of a car.
Hungarian: A kerékpáros meghalt, miután nekihajtott egy autónak.

English: The driver died at the scene.
He died at the scene despite the resuscitation.
Hungarian: Meghalt a helyszínen az újraélesztés ellenére.

English: The man died after getting run over by a van.
Hungarian: A férfi meghalt, miután aláhajtott egy kisteherautó.

English: The bus started burning after the collision.
Hungarian: A busz kigyulladt az ütközés után.

English: The car was damaged in the collision.
Three cars got sheet metal damage.
The taxi was damaged on its right side.
Hungarian: A taxi a jobb oldalán sérült meg.

English: The passenger car was damaged throughout.

Hungarian: A baleset torlódást okozott a forgalomban.

English: The second lane was closed from traffic.
Hungarian: A második sávot lezárták a forgalom elől.

Finnish: Tie oli suljettu vajaat puoli tuntia.
English: The road was closed for almost half an hour.
Hungarian: Az út majdnem fél órára le volt zárva.

Finnish: Paikalla oli käytössä vain yksi ajokaista.
English: There was only one lane in use at the scene.
Hungarian: Csak egy sáv volt használatban a helyszínen.

Finnish: Tiellä on käytössä vain toinen kaista.
English: Only one lane is in use on the road.
Hungarian: Az úton csak egy sáv van használatban.

English: The traffic on the road was cut off for the whole day.
Hungarian: Az út forgalma egész nap megszakadt.

English: The road was closed for traffic for an hour.
Hungarian: Az utat egy órára lezárták a forgalom elől.

English: The crossroads were closed for all traffic.
Hungarian: A kereszteződés minden forgalom elől le volt zárva.

English: The road was partly cut off.
Hungarian: Az út részben el volt zárva.

English: The road was blocked for about 20 minutes.
Hungarian: Az út kb. 20 percig volt lezárva.

English: The road was cut off during the rescue work.
Hungarian: Az út a mentési munkálatok alatt volt lezárva.

English: Traffic on the highway was completely cut off.
Hungarian: A forgalom az autópályán teljesen leállt.

English: The traffic accident is hindering traffic.
Hungarian: A közlekedési baleset akadályozta a forgalmat.
